property.name: navigationDevName
property.label: Navigation name
property.description: Pick the target nav when mode is set to Experience Cloud Navigation.

property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this nav.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: ctaOneLink
property.label: Call to Action link one
property.description: Label and URL for the call to action in Markdown link format. Leave blank if no cta is desired.

property.name: ctaOneIcon
property.label: Icon name for Call to Action link one
property.description: Font Awesome css classes to be applied.

property.name: ctaTwoLink
property.label: Call to Action link two
property.description: Label and URL for the call to action in Markdown link format. Leave blank if no cta is desired.

property.name: ctaTwoIcon
property.label: Icon name for Call to Action link two
property.description: Font Awesome css classes to be applied.

property.name: authMode
property.label: Authentication mode
property.description: Indicates how you want the authentication info to show. Select hide for unauthenticated experiences.

property.name: profileLink
property.label: Profile link
property.description: Label and URL for profile in Markdown link format. Leave blank if not showing auth.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
